snippet.title: PLATYPUS ADVENTURES | Cinematic Trailer 4K
snippet.description:
Available on Steam for Windows and Mac: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1719550/Platypus_Adventures/?beta=0&fbclid=IwAR0zWm8glbdoBNz5M2I6AQIR36r18y2KABDMz9UlIIr90DqGWmilpGg7NOk

Website: https://platypusadventures.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/euQg72B
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlatypusAdvent1

Recommend system specifications: 

Windows
Memory: 8 GB RAM or higher
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 series card or higher

Mac
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: Apple M1

A once peaceful forest is disrupted by a mysterious alien force, after a meteorite impacts nearby and strange powers possess the locals. An unprovoked attack on a nearby village in the forest, leads to a unlikely hero who must find the courage to confront a cosmic evil, and save their home. 

Platypus Adventures follows the story of Platy the Platypus, fighting back against evil forces and uncovering a dark mystery.

A third person, action adventure video game from independant game developer Figtree Digital. Overcome environmental based obstacles, and face a range of dangerous enemies across a vast Australian landscape.
